channel.title: RuneVeteran PK SPAWN Server 718
channel.description:
[CENTER]Welcome to Rune Veteran [SIZE=5][B]What is Rune Veteran?[/B][/SIZE]
Rune Veteran is a private server that is growing and growing! We are a server that is constantly growing and striving for perfection in the development stage! Once you're with Rune Veteran you won't ever want to log out!
Rune Veteran provides only with pking and perfect content. For example, we are a pking server and yet we do have a economy. That makes Rune Veteran unique. We have a unique pk system with a pk points store. If you like player killing this is the server for you!
Download : [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/5ty0ln40kthr40b/RuneVeteran.jar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/5ty0ln40kthr40b/RuneVeteran.jar[/url]
Webclient : ( I prefer client site is a bit laggy will fix asap ) [url=http://www.runeveterans.webs.com/play-now]RuneVeteran - Play now[/url]
Website : [url=http://www.runeveterans.webs.com]RuneVeteran[/url]
We will soon have a domain and auto-donate.
[SPOILER=Media][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img577/3130/voteshoph.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img829/5725/23899949.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img9/5223/multitelepeorts.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img818/7272/mainovn.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img708/134/kdrm.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img534/3074/agsx10.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img819/1053/pkplaatje.png[/img] [img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/9236/grgh.png[/img] [img]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/4288/singlepk.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

@Keyal wrote:

[CENTER]Welcome to Rune Veteran
[SIZE=5]What is Rune Veteran?[/SIZE]

Rune Veteran is a private server that is growing and growing!
We are a server that is constantly growing and striving for perfection in the development stage! Once you’re with Rune Veteran you won’t ever want to log out!

Rune Veteran provides only with pking and perfect content. For example, we are a pking server and yet we do have a economy. That makes Rune Veteran unique. We have a unique pk system with a pk points store. If you like player killing this is the server for you!
